PAGE ERROR: Hydration failed because the server rendered text didn't match the client. As a result this tree will be regenerated on the client. This can happen if a SSR-ed Client Component used:

- A server/client branch `if (typeof window !== 'undefined')`.
- Variable input such as `Date.now()` or `Math.random()` which changes each time it's called.
- Date formatting in a user's locale which doesn't match the server.
- External changing data without sending a snapshot of it along with the HTML.
- Invalid HTML tag nesting.

It can also happen if the client has a browser extension installed which messes with the HTML before React loaded.

https://react.dev/link/hydration-mismatch

specs.title: Scenario 4: Access protected route with valid token
Scenario 5: All requests route through Pingora proxy
Scenario 6: Handle expired session
should handle invalid login credentials gracefully
should redirect to login on session expiration
should display form validation errors
should handle network errors gracefully
should handle server errors (500) gracefully
should handle 404 not found errors
should handle forbidden access (403) gracefully
should handle CSRF validation errors
should handle duplicate resource creation errors
should allow error recovery and continued use
should handle missing required parameters
should handle request timeouts
@p0 should complete OAuth flow with valid PKCE parameters
@p0 should reject token exchange with incorrect code_verifier
@p0 should reject token exchange without code_verifier
@p0 should reject authorization request without code_challenge
@p0 should reject unsupported code_challenge_method
should generate valid PKCE parameters
should correctly compute code_challenge from code_verifier
@p0 should reject reused authorization code
@p0 should introspect valid access token (RFC 7662)
@p0 should return inactive for revoked access token
@p0 should return inactive for expired access token
@p0 should accept whitelisted redirect_uri
@p0 should reject non-whitelisted redirect_uri
@p0 should detect redirect_uri parameter tampering
@p1 should validate id_token contains all required OIDC claims
@p1 should validate id_token contains correct nonce
@p1 should validate id_token contains user profile claims
@p1 should lock account after 5 failed login attempts
@p1 should reject correct password during lockout period
@p1 should cache permissions for 5 minutes
@p1 should invalidate cache immediately after permission change
should load and display role list
should show create role button with proper permissions
should create a new role successfully
should edit an existing role successfully
should delete a role with confirmation
should open permissions editor for a role
should cancel role creation without saving
should validate required fields
should display all role table columns
should display all action buttons for each role
should create multiple roles successfully
should paginate through role list
@p0 should issue tokens after authorization code exchange
@p0 should auto-refresh access token when expired
@p0 should rotate refresh token after use
@p0 should revoke refresh token on logout
@p0 should revoke access token and reject API requests
@p0 should reject expired access token
@p0 should reload user permissions on token refresh
should detect refresh token replay attack
should load and display user list
should show create user button with proper permissions
should create a new user successfully
should edit an existing user successfully
should delete a user with confirmation
should cancel user creation without saving
should validate required fields
should paginate through user list
should create multiple users successfully
should display correct user data in table
